txt.en: With travel to the Wildwood possible once more, hunters have come in search of fabled beasts.
Poisoned traps can be found in the central Wildwood.\n\nLinnet has asked you to destroy any poisoned traps that you come across.
'Welcome back! It sounds like you found many of the poisoned traps. The poachers wonâ€™t appreciate it, but the creatures of the Wildwood certainly shall!'

'Greetings, [placeholder]. I am Linnet Redholm, Huntress of the Trollshaws! Perhaps you have heard tales of my deeds? No? Well then, clearly the bards are a lazy lot in Bree. Far have I travelled in Middle-earth, chasing rumours of fabled beasts and dangerous game. Whispers of marvellous creatures lurking in the Wildwood reached my ears and I set out immediately to make my way to these forests. \n\n'Imagine now my horror when I came across poisoned traps, laid by the filthy Orcs and poachers who have infiltrated these woods. Poison is the work of cowards, not of true hunters. I am on the trail of something huge, so I cannot attend to it myself, but if you were willing to destroy any of the traps you come across, I would make it more than worth your while.'
Linnet can be found in the south-central Wildwood.\n\nYou should return to Linnet.
